fullplot: The body of young girl is found beside an alpine lake in northern Italy. Sanzio, a middle aged police officer, is in charge of investigation. He is almost at retirement age and has an ill wife who does not to recognize him. In this apparently quite town, Sanzio, pursued by his family troubles, will find more than just the truth.
plot: The body of a young woman is found in a small and quiet town in North Italy. A detective from the nearby main city is called to solve the mystery.
title: The Girl by the Lake
